title: UI Developer
desc: Convert figma designs into web pages, and make sure that everything is responsive.

title: JavaScript Frontend Developer
desc: Fix frontend related bugs and add new features to the website.

title: React.js Developer
desc: Fix frontend related bugs and add new features to the website.

title: Data Analyst
desc: You will be given a small dataset and a set of questions to answer using that data. You will be expected to use your data analysis skills to answer the questions and present your findings in a clear and concise manner.

title: UI/UX Designer
desc: Turn ideas into UI/UX designs, and redesign existing websites.

title: Mobile Developer
desc: Convert UI/UX figma designs into fully functional mobile applications.

title: Console Programmer
desc: Build console applications with your favorite programming language to solve certain problems.

title: Web Scraping Specialist
desc: Write programs that can harvest/extract data from certain websites.

title: Graphic Designer
desc: Design logos, banners, and social media posts.

title: Backend Developer
desc: Build backend services, connect to databases, and integrate with APIs.
